data.description:
The game is designed for players to learn boxing skills, train, and compete with users worldwide. Key features include Tutorial Mode, Training Room, Single Player, and Multiplayer.
# Tutorial Mode
The Tutorial Mode is designed to help users learn the basic functions and controls of the game. This mode provides step-by-step guidance from basic to advanced boxing techniques, making it easy for newcomers to follow along with detailed explanations and instructions.

# Training Room
The Training Room offers a realistic boxing gym environment with various training features. Using equipment like sandbags, mitts, and other training gear, players can improve their stamina and skills. This is where users can build their abilities and prepare for real matches.

{847221067367319}
{3017006661774967}

# Single Player Mode
The Single Player Mode offers two main modes:

- **Ranking Match Mode:** 
Players can improve their ranking by competing against increasingly challenging NPCs.
-  **Match Mode:**
Players can test their skills against NPCs with different styles and abilities.
{2178002429245627}

# Customization Features
Manny Boxing VR offers a wide range of customization options for players to enjoy the game with their unique boxer.
{339354655914897}
Multiplayer Mode
The Multiplayer Mode allows real-time matches with users from around the world. In this mode, players can compete with players from different regions and challenge global rankings. Form teams with friends or meet new rivals in this competitive environment.

changelog.change_log:
Hello, Champions!

A major update for Manny is coming on May 31, 2024! This update includes exciting new features that will enhance your gaming experience. Check it out now!

1. ChampionShip Mode Added
The new ChampionShip mode starts at rank 100 and challenges you to face Manny. Aim for the top and claim the Champion Belt. Itâ€™s your time to shine!

2. Customizing Feature Added
You can now customize your character in single-player mode. Create your unique style and enjoy a more personalized gaming experience!

3. Two New Maps Added
Explore two brand new maps, each offering unique challenges and adventures. Dive into the excitement of these new environments!

4. Existing Maps Renewal
Our existing maps have been revamped with better graphics and improved gameplay experience, providing a more immersive gaming adventure.

5. Announcer and Narrator Added
Professional announcers and narrators have been brought in to bring your matches to life. Enjoy more thrilling and realistic game commentaries!

6. Background Music Renewal
Thirteen new background tracks have been added. Enhance the atmosphere of the arena with a variety of exciting new music!

This update will make the game more diverse and thrilling. We look forward to your continued support and hope you have a fantastic time with Manny!

Thank you.

The Appnori Team
During network transmission, data encryption was applied.
